landing.subhero: Track, manage, and optimize your medication routine with AI
landing.feature1Desc: Effortlessly log and monitor your medicine intake.
landing.feature2Desc: Voice-enabled AI for instant medicine details.
landing.feature3Desc: Get reminders and sync with Google Calendar.
landing.faq1Ans: We use JWT authentication and encrypt sensitive data.
landing.faq2Ans: Yes, our AI Assistant supports voice input.
landing.signup: Ready to Transform Your Health Routine?
